columns.Customer_Interaction_ID: The unique identifier for each customer interaction.
columns.Channel_ID: The identifier for the communication channel used.
columns.Customer_ID: The identifier for the customer involved in the interaction.
columns.Service_ID: The identifier for the specific service related to the interaction.
columns.Status_Code: The current status of the customer interaction.
columns.Services_and_Channels_Details: The feedback on services and channels used by customers.

Customer_Interactions.table_description: The table tracks interactions between customers and services.

columns.Integration_Platform_ID: The unique identifier for each integration platform entry.
columns.Customer_Interaction_ID: The identifier linking to the customer interaction record.
columns.Integration_Platform_Details: The outcome status of the integration platform usage.

Integration_Platform.table_description: The table records details of integration platforms used in customer interactions.

columns.Analytical_ID: The unique identifier for each analytical layer entry.
columns.Customers_and_Services_ID: The identifier linking to customers and services records.
columns.Pattern_Recognition: The classification of patterns recognized in the data.
columns.Analytical_Layer_Type_Code: The type of analytical layer, categorizing its level.

Analytical_Layer.table_description: The table analyzes customer interactions and associated service patterns.

columns.Service_ID: The unique identifier for each service offered.
columns.Service_Details: The description of the specific service provided.

Services.table_description: The table lists various services available for government transactions.

columns.Customer_ID: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.Customer_Details: The detailed information about the customer.

Customers.table_description: The table stores essential information about government customers.

columns.Channel_ID: The unique identifier for each communication channel.
columns.Channel_Details: The details describing the specific communication channel.

Channels.table_description: The table outlines communication channels for customer interactions.

columns.Customers_and_Services_ID: The unique identifier for each customer and service pairing.
columns.Customer_ID: The identifier linking to the customer utilizing the service.
columns.Service_ID: The identifier linking to the specific service offered.
columns.Customers_and_Services_Details: The assessment of customer satisfaction with the service.

Customers_and_Services.table_description: The table captures customer satisfaction related to services provided.
